section.p: The Procedure Implants section records any materials placed during the procedure including stents, tubes, and drains.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="59771-6" Procedure Implants (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8179)
The Implants section SHALL include a statement providing details of the implants placed, or assert no implants were placed (CONF:8769)
